div.p: Climate indices are available from NOAA at https://www.esrl.noaa.gov/psd/data/climateindices/list/. USGS stream measurements are available at https://waterdata.usgs.gov/nwis/measurements and streamflow measurements from http://waterdata.usgs.gov/nwis/dv/?referred_module=sw. Precipitation data are available from PRISM climate group at http://www.prism.oregonstate.edu/. Summary statistics and graphs for all sites are provided in the Supplementary information. All codes were written in the open-source programming language R.
